content.title: Adobe Acrobat Reader DC Classic Track Security Technical Implementation Guide
content.platform: Adobe Acrobat Reader DC Classic Track
content.description: This Security Technical Implementation Guide is published as a tool to improve the security of Department of Defense (DoD) information systems. The requirements are derived from the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) 800-53 and related documents. Comments or proposed revisions to this document should be sent via e-mail to the following address: disa.stig_spt@mail.mil.

content.title: Microsoft DotNet Framework 4.0 STIG
content.description: Applicable to systems and applications utilizing the Microsoft .Net version 4.0 framework.

content.title: USGCB: Guidance for Securing Microsoft Windows 7 Systems
content.publisher: National Institute of Standards and Technology
content.description: This guide has been created to assist IT professionals in effectively securing systems running Microsoft 7
content.notice: Do not attempt to implement any of the settings in this guide without first testing them in a non-operational environment. NIST assumes no responsibility whatsoever for its use by other parties, and makes no guarantees, expressed or implied, about its quality, reliability, or any other characteristic. NIST would appreciate acknowledgement if the document and template are used.

content.title: USGCB: Guidance for Securing Microsoft Windows 7 energy settings
content.publisher: National Institute of Standards and Technology
content.description: This guide has been created to assist IT professionals, in effectively configuring energy conserving settings on systems with Microsoft Windows 7
content.notice: Do not attempt to implement any of the settings in this guide without first testing them in a non-operational environment. NIST assumes no responsibility whatsoever for its use by other parties, and makes no guarantees, expressed or implied, about its quality, reliability, or any other characteristic. NIST would appreciate acknowledgement if the document and template are used.

content.title: Windows 2008 Domain Controller Security Technical Implementation Guide
content.description: The Windows 2008 Security Technical Implementation Guide (STIG) is published as a tool to improve the security of Department of Defense (DoD) information systems. The requirements were developed from DoD consensus, as well as the Windows 2008 Security Guide and security templates published by Microsoft Corporation. Comments or proposed revisions to this document should be sent via e-mail to the following address: disa.stig_spt@mail.mil.
